Tutorial¶

Data¶

This tutorial utilises observations of N2H+ (1-0) towards the Infrared Dark Cloud G035.39-00.33. This data set was first published in Henshaw et al. 2013.. These observations were carried out with the IRAM 30m Telescope. IRAM is supported by INSU/CNRS (France), MPG (Germany) and IGN (Spain).
